casebody.data:
98-3218 (La. 4/23/99)

STATE ex rel. Samuel ANDERSON v. STATE of Louisiana. No. 98-KH-3218. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Anderson, Samuel; — Plaintiff(s); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writ; Parish of Franklin 5th Judicial District Court Div. “B” Number 94-70; to the Court of Appeal, Second Circuit, Number 31941-KH

Denied.

JOHNSON, J. not on panel.
